name: Blade of Arena
description: <h3>You can support us on Kickstarter now: http://kck.st/32iMCLV</h3><br/><br/>Blade of Arena is a multiplayer online PVP game.<br/>We have 3 game mode : <br/>Survival - 8 players fright in one island, after 3 rounds. The top player will be the dragon!<br/>Duel (1v1) - 2 players fright each other, gain 3 kills to win!<br/>Capture (4v4) - 2 teams try to capture tower to gain points.<br/><br/>We hope players can enjoy the pure Action PVP fight!
